Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Bulk heterojunction type |
| Polymer solar cells |
| Based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| Have broad photocurrent response |
| Wavelength range |
| From 300 nm to 1.1 μm |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Bulk heterojunction type |
| Polymer solar cells |
| Wavelength range |
| From 300 nm to 1.1 μm |

Note: "Have broad" is not a material property and was removed. The specific materials PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM were also not included as they are not properties, but rather the materials themselves.
